summary: This module implements a collection of graph neural network layers built on DGL and PyTorch, providing advanced message‑passing, edge‑softmax, multi‑layer perceptron transformations, and normalization utilities for constructing deep GCN architectures, including support for molecular bond encoding.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly assemble and train deep graph convolutional models for tasks such as molecular property prediction, network analysis, and other graph‑structured data applications.
